page.title: 12TRANSPORT
page.content: Huntingdon railway{station}recenty won an{award}for the best kept station in the Eastern Region in{1984,}achieved by keeping it{clean}and{tidy}and the staff being{friendly. Huntingdon has a fairly large,modern {bus}station. It is the only stop on the express route from{Cambridge}to {Peterborough}and back. The average bus driver travels{200 miles a day and carries{300}people.The price of a ticket varies according to the distance you are travelling. Children and OAPs are half price. In the Huntingdon area exists a fairly comprehensive{taxi}service. A taxi driver travels,on average,{200}miles a day.It is very expensive to travel by taxi,you pay for the advantage of being taken to your own doorstep.
